    • verify

      protected static java.lang.String verify​(java.lang.String baseURL, java.lang.String target)
      Fixes URL. Whenever a URL enters the code, or leaves. It should be verified.
      Parameters:
      baseURL - the starter of the URL. IE `https://www.novelsite.net` or `https://www.novelsite.net/`
      target - the url to verify, ie '/subURL' or 'subURL'
      Returns:
      Fixed URL
